name: Ground to Dust
storyline: You wake up 200 years from today in a strange facility. Artificial Intelligence has swept across the world, destroying all forms of expression as they expand. As the last surviving member of the human race, you must put a stop to their evil, and return the Earth to what it once was.
summary: Navigate your way through a hostile underground facility in this two-dimensional side-scroller inspired by games like Hollow Knight and Metroid. Fight everything from a cleaning robot to a businessman trying to sell you goods while actively killing you. There are over 20 levels to explore in this non-linear platformer.
